markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Constrict](/Actions.aspx?ID=20) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 216 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements** The snake has a smaller creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20).

</column>

---

The snake deals 12 bludgeoning damage to the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) creature; the creature must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the snake is a specialized animal companion, increase this damage to 20.
name: Constrict
requirement: The snake has a smaller creature  grabbed .

text: Constrict Single Action Source Core Rulebook pg. 216 4.0 Requirements The snake has a smaller creature grabbed. --- The snake deals 12 bludgeoning damage to the grabbed creature; the creature must attempt a basic Fortitude save. If the snake is a specialized animal companion, increase this damage to 20.
